name: In prison 4 a reason
description:
Humanity had sentenced you to long-life imprisonment but don't be upset, life gave you a second chance. Companion AI in your cell broke and decided to help your lost soul to escape. 

Unravel puzzles, overcome challenges, fight for your freedom, and don't forget to have fun! 

PLAY FREE DEMO HERE:

https://eugene-dembowski.itch.io/in-prison-4-a-reason-demo
